title: Regarding rerolling legacy skin shards
body:
My friends and I have been wondering, if you have reroll 3 legacy skin shards does that result in getting a legacy skin?

I know legacy skins can vary in rarity so if you were to reroll 3 epic legacy shards, will I net an epic legacy skin? 

We're wondering because loot FAQ doesn't contain any information regarding Legacy content, other than you can obtain legacy content as a shard from chests.

replies.body: Nope! Rerolling shards is completely random, so the type of shard you use doesn't affect the type of shards you get at all.
